name: 青少年心理學
goals: Understanding the meaning and the importance of adolescence problems during this changing society
Understanding the development of adolescence from the bio-psycho-social view
Understanding the theories of multi-facet adolescence problems
Understanding the experimental designs and current findings of adolescence and the applications to teaching and counseling
Establishing a good counseling vision and effective coping strategies
syllabus:
Week 1: Introduction

Week 2: Chapter 1: INTRODUCTION

Week 3: Chapter 2: PUBERTY, HEALTH, AND BIOLOGICAL FOUNDATIONS

Week 4: Chapter 3: THE BRAIN AND COGNITIVE DEVELOPMENT

Week 5: Chapter 4: THE SELF, IDENTITY, EMOTION, AND PERSONALITY

Week 6: Chapter 5: GENDER

Week 7: Chapter 6: SEXUALITY

Week 8: Midterm exam

Week 9: Chapter 7: MORAL DEVELOPMENT, VALUES, AND RELIGION

Week 10: Chapter 8: FAMILIES

Week 11: Chapter 9: PEERS, ROMANTIC RELATIONSHIPS, AND LIFESTYLES

Week 12: Chapter 10: SCHOOLS

Week 13: Chapter 11: ACHIEVEMENT, WORK, AND CAREERS

Week 14: Chapter 12: CULTURE

Week 15: Chapter 13: PROBLEMS IN ADOLESCENCE AND EMERGING

Week 16: Final exam

grading.note: Ask one question for each chapter
Answer several questions (depends on the number of the students in this course)
